author: djrtwo
content: what was the bug <@!449019668296892420>  (other than maybe dos-ing you)

author: arnetheduck
content: the block was in the expected slot range `[finalized_check_point.epoch.start_slot, wallClock)`, and had a parent that was part of the canonical chain, passed state validation, had the expected proposer etc - but we were missing a check that the block was no longer viable because the chain had moved on to a newer finalization checkpoint - this caused our fork choice to freak out (as it should)
